channel.title: ::317:: help with drops they drop food :s
channel.description: When you kill somebody you get food and odd chance of an obby cape How do i change this so it only drops their stuff?

item.title: ::317:: help with drops they drop food :s
item.dc:creator: @I_Yaa_I I Yaa I
item.description:
@I_Yaa_I wrote:

[quote=“coocoobanana, post:3, topic:309098”]thats just what npcs drop
When you die on mine you drop loads of food but your stuff dotn appear[/quote]

item.title: ::317:: help with drops they drop food :s
item.dc:creator: @ghostly150 ghostly150
item.description:
@ghostly150 wrote:

go into the config folder in your server files and open up NPCdrops or whatever and find the npc id and it will come up with numbers. delete whatever line the food id is on.

Read full topic
